title: Sperm DNA damage may contribute to repeated miscarriages

title_detail.value: Sperm DNA damage may contribute to repeated miscarriages

summary: Some cases of recurrent pregnancy loss may be caused by sperm DNA damage in the male partner, rather than by a problem in affected women.

summary_detail.value: Some cases of recurrent pregnancy loss may be caused by sperm DNA damage in the male partner, rather than by a problem in affected women.
